Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!
Presenting Jeb's newest toy...

[SIZE=6][B]The Bushpilot[/B][/SIZE]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4svOgmx.jpg[/img]

A fun little cargoplane designed to perform slow landings and takeoffs in difficult terrain. Comes with extra economy-seats and an air-droppable science probe!

[imgur]tSGPU[/imgur]


[B]Used Mods:
[/B]
KAX
[thread]76668[/thread]
TweakScale
[thread]112693[/thread]
Adjustable Landing Gear
[thread]99660[/thread]
AoA Technologies MK2 cockpits and drones
[thread]113162[/thread]
Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement (recommended :P)
[thread]55657[/thread]

[B]Recommended actiongroups:
[/B]
1 - Toggle Turboprops
2 - Toggle Jump Jet Engines
3 - Turboprops to reverse
4 - Flaps (Big-S-Elevons)

[B]Link to KerbalX:
[url]http://kerbalx.com/Goldeselchen/Bushpilot[/url][/B]

Enjoy! :)

I immediately started humming this when I saw the pic: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YqLr0Qy-DyE[/url]

Which is... not a bad thing? I think?

It is very pretty. :)

[quote name='Stargate525']Which is... not a bad thing? I think?[/QUOTE]

No, not bad I think. If its bad, I'm guilty too :)

[quote name='Motokid600']Flight of the Phoenix?[/QUOTE]

Honestly, I haven't seen the original or the remake (yet!)
But the Fairchild C-82 and C-119 are two of the most beautiful planes ever build :kiss:
